name: Holiday Inn Express Toulouse Airport

reviews.text: This airport hotel is spotlessley clean in both the rooms and lobby area and seemingly brand new.
reviews.title: Great Modern Hotel

likes.disliked: — The One Euro city tax per person

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Standard HI Express room - these are often far superioir to older 'full scale Holiday Inn' rooms.
reviews.title: a very good Express!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast is great with a larger than normal choice for this chain.
reviews.title: pleasantly surprised

reviews.text: The courtesy bus is also very good and available almost 'on demand'.
reviews.title: Great hotel but I won't be coming back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Too cold to use the pool in November, but it looked OK!
reviews.title: Typical Express by Holiday Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Having picked the hotel by its convenience to the airport since we had a late arrival, we were pleasantly surprised by its amenities. The shuttle from the hotel picked us up promptly after being called from prominently displayed phone in airport lobby. The driver did not accept a tip even though it was after 11 pm! The room was streamlined (modern) but had everything we needed, including shower, hairdryer and separate toilet area. The buffet continental breakfast was outstanding. Many types of fruits, juices, breads, and cereals as well as ham and cheeses including camembert, a machine to make coffee specialties such as espresso and cafe au lait. The staff was most helpful. The next morning we took the shuttle to the airport to rent a car and we were on our way!
reviews.title: Better than expected

likes.disliked: — No clocks in room - also missing from all other hotels where we stayed!

reviews.text: Holiday Inn's often get a bucketing for coming up with predictable and sometimes poorly executed product offerings. This Holiday Inn however is neither of the previous, in fact it is exactly what you expect and want from a middle level hotel, attention to detail throughout, rooms of a decent size and with quality inclusions through-out. Staff were very attentive and at 155 Euro per night this hotel is decent value for money. For a short stay near the airport this hotel is a good pick.
reviews.title: there is nothing wrong with this holiday inn

likes.liked: — very comfortable after a long journey getting there, very handy to airport obviously
likes.disliked: — the food was dreadful, go to the local village Blagnac (up the road) for all your meals

aka: Holiday Inn Express Toulouse Airport Hotel
description: The Holiday Inn Express Toulouse Airport is located just 2 minutes away from Toulouse-Blagnac International Airport and 15 minutes away from Toulouse City centre. It is in the heart of the European airplane industry (EADS-Airbus, Rockwell Collins, ATR). This modern 3 stars hotel is the most perfect address for business and leisure travelers.The hotel Holiday Inn Express Toulouse Airport offers 119 air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms, with High Speed Internet access, WIFI, complimentary tea & coffee making facilities, flat screen TV (Sky Sports available), Pay TV, a large desk to experience work space and relaxing moments. The 10 Family and business rooms offer an even greater comfort and can be booked for up to 4 persons. All clients can enjoy our complimentary buffet breakfast.The 3 modern conference & meeting rooms with natural daylight, air condition, complimentary video beamer are fully equipped with high speed internet, WIFI and all conference materials needed for a successful meeting for up to 75 persons. Enjoy the relaxing atmosphere of our Wine bar with Plasma TV Screen, our large terrace and the beautiful design outdoor heated swimming poolIn addition the hotel provides a free airport shuttle service (Monday to Friday 5.30 am to midnight, other days from 6.30am to 11pm) and a private car park.
